scripts.init: npm i && dotenvx run -- prisma generate
scripts.build: npm i && dotenvx run -- prisma generate && dotenvx run -- vite build
scripts.reinstall: npm ci && dotenvx run -- prisma generate
scripts.docker:build: docker compose exec app npm run host:build -- --host
scripts.docker:update-schema: docker compose exec app npx prisma db pull && docker compose exec app npx prisma generate
scripts.docker:export-profiles-pdf: docker compose exec app npm run host:export-profiles-pdf
scripts.docker:export-profile-json: docker compose exec app npm run host:export-profile-json
scripts.docker:export-profile-schema: docker compose exec app npm run host:export-profile-schema
scripts.docker:export-profile-data: docker compose exec app npm run host:export-profile-data
scripts.docker:import-profile-json: docker compose exec app npm run host:import-profile-json
scripts.docker:clear-directus-cache: docker compose exec app npm run host:clear-directus-cache
scripts.docker:copy-collection: docker compose exec app npm run host:copy-collection
scripts.docker:db:cli: docker compose exec database psql -U postgres -d smartjobseeker
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose exec app npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.docker:db:migrate:new: docker compose exec app npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.docker:db:migrate:deploy: docker compose exec app npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.docker:admin:production: npx dotenvx run -f .env.production -- docker compose -f docker compose.directus.yml up
scripts.host:build: dotenvx run -- prisma generate && dotenvx run -- vite build
